content: HSH Split drive anchor Economical split drive anchor for tamper-resistant fastenings in concrete ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Mechanical anchors- ### FEATURES:Features Easy, one-step installation Hole size is the same as the anchor size Anchors are tamper-proof Applications Fastening wood, steel or other items to concrete Electrical fixtures Track attachment Roof flashing Tamper-proof applications ### TECHNICAL DATA: Head configuration: Countersunk Technical Data | Head configuration | Countersunk, Rounded head ### ITEMS- 2173478 - Split bolt HSH 1/4 x 2 1/2 FH - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x HSH 1/4 FH Split bolt
